name: Competent
text: Focus on strengths, make and correct safe mistakes, trust ourselves.

name: Confident
text: Believe in ourselves, do what we can, take our time to complete things

name: Connected
text: Express emotions in a safe community, solve problems, participate in our community

name: Character
text: Show a positive and helpful attitude towards others. Grow from every situation.

name: Contribution
text: Make positive changes by giving your time and skills to people and communities

name: Coping skills
text: Learn positive behavior by being good listeners, kind speakers, and generous doers

name: Control
text: Take one step at a time. Learn to do things differently.
